Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-4741 affecting package openssl for versions less than 1.1.1k-31
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-4741 affecting package openssl for versions less than 1.1.1k-31. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssl is earlier than 1.1.1k-31, affected by CVE-2024-4741
